metadata.title: Text to Video - Wan Ai AI Video Generator
metadata.description: Generate stunning videos from text prompts using Wan 2.6 AI technology on Wan Ai platform.

page.title: Text to Video
page.description: Transform your ideas into videos with AI. Simply describe what you want to see, and Wan 2.6 will create it for you.

hero.title: Create Videos from Text
hero.description: Describe your vision and let Wan 2.6 AI bring it to life. Generate stunning videos from simple text prompts.

items.title: Simple to Use
items.description: Just type what you want to see and our AI does the rest. No video editing skills required.

items.title: Wan 2.6 Technology
items.description: Powered by the latest Wan 2.6 AI model for superior video generation quality.

items.title: Fast Generation
items.description: Get your videos in minutes, not hours. Our optimized pipeline ensures quick results.

items.title: High Quality Output
items.description: Generate videos in stunning resolution with smooth motion and realistic details.

generator.title: Generate Your Video
generator.prompt_placeholder: A serene sunset over the ocean, with waves gently crashing on the shore...

examples.title: Example Prompts
items: A cinematic drone shot of a futuristic city at night with neon lights
A peaceful forest scene with sunlight filtering through the trees
An astronaut floating in space with Earth in the background

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: Pay only for what you use. No hidden fees.
